text: <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Kinetics in Differentiating Cells

The limited capacity of differentiated effector cells to induce <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression suggests that iTreg induction has to occur before effector T cell differentiation occurs .

text: Therefore , we analyzed the expression of <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> during the differentiation of naive <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cells into Th0 ( neutral , anti - <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , anti - <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and anti <extra_id_0> IL-12 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , Th2 , and iTreg phenotypes .

text: After initiation of the differentiation process , <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> showed a similar expression kinetic within the first 3 d , which are considered to be critical in T cell commitment [ 18 ] .

text: Under Th2 differentiation conditions , <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression increased only marginally ( Figure 4A , left panel ) .

text: Thus , although <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> showed similar kinetics , their expression polarizes at the end of the differentiation process when cells were cultured towards Th2 or iTreg cells , respectively ( Figure 4A and 4B ) .

text: Interestingly , the Th0 cells were expressing more <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> than the Th2 cells , but expressed low levels of <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; however , the protein expression slightly differed from mRNA expression , suggesting also posttranslational regulation and degradation as potential additional mechanisms in the differentiation process .

text: On the single-cell level , it can be seen that cells progress through a transition phase , where <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression coexist to some degree in the same cells , which is resolved in iTreg cells after 7 d ( Figure 4B ) .

text: Taken together , these data demonstrated that Th2 cells have lost their capacity to express <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and showed that Th2 and iTreg cells arise from two different differentiation pathways .
